title: SalÃƒÂ² o le 120 giornate di Sodoma AKA Salo, or The 120 Days of So
description:
SalÃƒÂ² o le 120 giornate di Sodoma (1975)

Not the Criterion edition, but a decent copy anyway.

(from the case)

Pasolini\&#039;s final and most controversial film has been banned, censored and reviled the world over since its first release.  The film is based on the Marquis de Sade\&#039;s novel \"120 Days of Sodom\", with the setting transposed to Mussolini\&#039;s miniature Fascist Republic of SalÃƒÂ², Italy in 1944.

The film\&#039;s content and imagry is extreme, and it retains the power to shock, repel and distress a quarter of a century on.  SalÃƒÂ² remains a cinematic milestone -- culturally significant, politically vital and visually stunning.

\&#039;Pasolini\&#039;s final feature has emerged to appal a new generation grown complacent on consumerism and passive on permissiveness\&#039;
***** Empire

\&#039;a fearsome work of art\&#039;  What\&#039;s On

\&#039;still relevant, still troubling\&#039;  Time Out
